results.headline: LONELY GUY, THE (MOVIE)

results.headline: CONFIDENTIALLY YOURS (MOVIE)
results.summary_short: Truffaut's last. Odd mystery, falls between Nancy Drew and Nick & Nora. Curiously flat and perfunctory.
